response.original_title: Doug Thompson: Who Taught You That?
response.overview: With a different look on the everyday life, and the ability to find positive funny analogies on the pitfalls of it all; comedian Doug Thompson is a ray of light. He became an opening act for "The Impractical Jokers" from Tru Tv hit show and has never looked back. Since 2013 he has toured with them playing sold-out shows all across the Nation.
response.title: Doug Thompson: Who Taught You That?
